name: 带枪的猎物
description:
The English Version of this game will release soon
Under command of a young boy to complete his plan and dig out the hidden truth and his motivation
Control a spy corporate with different people, use their advantages to achieve your goal
Elimate Target Collect objects during game to murder your target or misguide police
Arrow KeyControl movement EnterOperate PgDn Get hints
Solve puzzle Crack puzzle to find out the hidden truth
Experience Story Enjoy the story line we prepared
Truth Finishing your missions and your revenge
